oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Record of D Bleek's visit to the Hadza of Tanganyika, 1930. Words and sentences and fragmented narratives towards the latter half of the book. Also many descriptions of personal history and rough genealogical diagrams, and comments about things that Bushmen do and eat, especially cutting and tattooing by doctors when people are ill.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek - Book BC151_A3_028
